channel.title: Help with Running Server!
channel.description:
i need help with running my server... heres a bit of info...
Checklist
1. Java JDK (Yes) 2.No-ip (Yes) 3.client (Yes) 4. Portfowarding (No {do i need to do this so that i can use my server on my comp?}) 5. Default Port[43594] (No) 6.Server-Bace (yes) {PROJECT 16} 7. Running Compiler (Yes, Duh)
What do i do to make my server so that i can see it ? (only me)

item.title: Help with Running Server!
item.dc:creator: @x_burny_x x_burny_x
item.description:
@x_burny_x wrote:

[quote=“kingjohn433, post:5, topic:195593”][quote author=:O Wowzers! link=topic=260088.msg2157175#msg2157175 date=1207217221]
4, yes you do need port forwarding if you have router and what do u mean “see it”
[/quote]

What i mean by “see it” is that i want to be able to use my server…Just me…no networking…[/quote]

just get a client click run client then log in set port to 5555 if it isnt 43594 ( make sure to run server 1st )

Read full topic

item.title: Help with Running Server!
item.dc:creator: @kingjohn433 kingjohn433
item.description:
@kingjohn433 wrote:

:O Wowzers!:

4, yes you do need port forwarding if you have router and what do u mean “see it”

What i mean by “see it” is that i want to be able to use my server…Just me…no networking…

Read full topic

item.title: Help with Running Server!
item.dc:creator: @bhpkyeah satesql
item.description:
@bhpkyeah wrote:

you dont have to type ip at all… it knows that your the localhost

Read full topic

item.title: Help with Running Server!
item.dc:creator: @_n_A_c_H_o [n]A[c]H[o]
item.description:
@_n_A_c_H_o wrote:

you compile the server, you run the server, you open up a client (eg. moparscape) and type ur username and pass and 127.0.0.1 as ip and ur port as whatever you set it to (probably 43594 as its default) and play

Read full topic

item.title: Help with Running Server!
item.dc:creator: @kingjohn433 kingjohn433
item.description:
@kingjohn433 wrote:

i need help with running my server… heres a bit of info…

Checklist

  1. Java JDK (Yes)
    2.No-ip (Yes)
    3.client (Yes)
  2. Portfowarding (No {do i need to do this so that i can use my server on my comp?})
  3. Default Port[43594] (No)
    6.Server-Bace (yes) {PROJECT 16}
  4. Running Compiler (Yes, Duh)

What do i do to make my server so that i can see it ? (only me)

Read full topic
